nodes.text: The SJ-4 Rapid Geoanalysis Scout was a prototype speeder model produced by Galactic Solutions Industries during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Members of GSI were using these speeders to study geomagnetic pulses beneath the surface of Ziost shortly before the eradication of all life on the planet in 3636 BBY.
The SJ-4 Rapid Geoanalysis Scout appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan during the mission "Dead Pulse" on Ziost.
